content: My Uncles: Edward R.Rose,US Army. WWII. Delbert G. Rose, US Army. WWII. Emory "CLYDE" Rose,USAF. WWII. All of WV. My Grandfather...Arlie Lee Welch, US Army. WWI. Of Clendenin,WV. "I'll see you again" Only Two Defining Forces Have Ever Offered To Die For You. 1.Jesus Christ 2.The US SOLDIER. One died for your Soul, The Other Died for Your Freedom!

content: In Loving memory of: Ross E Hutchings, Jr. Pvt U.S. Army 101st AB 327 Gliders WWII. My Father. Deceased. Louis V Mete, 101st AB, 502 Pcht Rgt, Medic WWII My Friend and Neighbor. Deceased. Rest In Peace. Salute. Roger Wooster, Viet Nam. Deceased. My Boyhood Friend. Rest In Peace. Salute. To all those who gave the ultimate sacrifice for this Great Nation. Salute. May the Good Lord hold each and every one of you. There is only one thing worse than messing an old fart, and that is messing with two.
reply: In Loving memory of: Ross E Hutchings, Jr. Pvt U.S. Army 101st AB 327 Gliders WWII. My Father. Deceased. Louis V Mete, 101st AB, 502 Pcht Rgt, Medic WWII My Friend and Neighbor. Deceased.
